Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is a highly promising electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: We investigated the conductivity-enhancing effect of nanosized YSZ to explore key techniques to decrease the operating temperature.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: YSZ nanoparticles ranging from 2 to 4 nm were synthesized with oleate groups by the hydrothermal method at various oleate/metal ion ratios (Ole/M = 1.00, 0.75, and 0.50).
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The nanoparticles were sintered, and the ionic conductivities were evaluated.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The 1.00 Ole/M sample exhibited high dispersibility in cyclohexane and showed a nearly monodispersed distribution.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The other samples possessed agglomerated nanoparticles.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The sintered YSZ nanoparticles had densities of 3.36-2.80 g/cm(3) and ionic conductivities of 2.52-1.16 mS/cm at 750 degrees C, which are higher than those of commercial 8 mol % YSZ.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: Furthermore, the sintered YSZ nanoparticles exhibited higher activation energies than the commercial samples in the lower temperature range (550-650 degrees C).
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity enhancement despite the high activation energy is likely due to the increased grain boundary volume.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles

Sentencas: This study demonstrated the successful production of YSZ with high ionic conductivity and sinterability upon sintering at 1050 degrees C using YSZ nanoparticles.
Titulo: Ionic Conductivity of Electrolytes Composed of Oleate-Capped Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Nanoparticles
